name: Death Starting Purgatory Stran
description:
You are a cool monster hunter in the dark. In a death duel, you must kill all the monsters stranding. If these creatures get to the city, then trouble will happen. You have a cannon and a magical flashlight that will show where the monsters stranding. In this death battle it will be necessary to fight off monsters of varying complexity and to search for ammunition in the area. You have three magic medallions that will help you rise again, but when they run out of monsters stranding to the shore you will be able to win, be careful!

Features of the game Death Starting Purgatory Stranding:
1. Fight with the monsters stranding
2. You are the only kot to save the city from death battle
3. Realistic darkness and open coast
